content:
# Factorio Agent Report - Steps 0-47

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Steam Power Generation at (x=-9.5, y=-0.5) to (x=0.5, y=6.5)
Generates electricity using steam power. The boiler was refueled (Step 40, 45) and power is currently active.
Consists of:
- Offshore Pump at (x=-9.5, y=-0.5)
- Boiler at (x=-5.0, y=2.5) (Currently fueled with coal)
- Steam Engine at (x=0.5, y=6.5)
- PipeGroup connecting pump to boiler (x=-8.5, y=-0.5) to (x=-5.5, y=0.5)
- PipeGroup connecting boiler to steam engine (x=-3.5, y=3.5) to (x=-2.5, y=6.5)

### Crude Oil Extraction and Processing
Extracts crude oil and processes it into petroleum gas, intended for plastic bar production. Power is currently active.
Consists of:
- PumpJack at (x=17.5, y=40.5) extracting crude oil.
- StorageTank at (x=25.5, y=43.5) storing crude oil.
- OilRefinery at (x=30.5, y=63.5) processing crude oil into petroleum gas. (Status: FLUID_INGREDIENT_SHORTAGE in Step 47 log, likely intermittent)
- StorageTank at (x=40.5, y=66.5) storing petroleum gas.
